short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customize your YouTube feed to show only specified channel videos

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: YouTube Feed Customizer is a powerful Chrome extension that puts you in control of your YouTube homepage experience. By allowing you to specify which channels you want to see, it helps you focus on the content that matters most to you, eliminating distractions and saving time.
